function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increasing human impacts from building practices","Impact":"Greater risk of spreading contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing sanitation and hygiene protocols, increasing ventilation, and reducing close contact in built environments","Technologies":"Air purifiers, touchless fixtures, UV-C disinfection","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and community members","Owner":"Building owners, architects, and facility managers"}]}
